instruction: Design a storyboard for a 60 second advertisement.
output:
The storyboard should focus on highlighting the features of the product and should include visuals that evoke emotion. The ad should have the following structure: 
Scene 1 - Introduce the product and its main features 
Scene 2 - Show the benefits of the product 
Scene 3 - Create a sense of urgency by highlighting the limited-time offer 
Scene 4 - Connect the product to the target customer
